description: With Griffin's PowerDock, you can put an end to family power struggles--literally. Does your family own a bunch of different iPod models? Can you only find one charger when all of you need to recharge? Call a cease-fire with PowerDock, a charging base where every iPod and iPhone in the house can get together to charge their batteries. Just slip your iPod or iPhone into place to safely charge. Two Apple Universal Docks are built into a single charging base, allowing you to charge any two iPod models at once. Substantial brushed aluminum with a grippable rubber base stays put on countertops and desktops. The PowerDock station includes a collection of Universal Dock insert adapters to ensure that every iPod and iPhone in the house gets a place at the table.What's in the BoxGriffin PowerDock Charging Station, eight Universal Dock inserts to fit iPod models that charge by dock connector, and user's guide.
title: Griffin PowerDock Dual-Position Charging Station for iPhone 4 & 4S, iPod Touch, iPod Nano (Silver)
